name: prompt-decorators-core
description: Core decorators for the Prompt Decorators standard

decorators.description: Modifies the AI's response to provide explicit reasoning paths before reaching conclusions. This decorator encourages the model to show its thought process, making responses more transparent and trustworthy.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: The level of detail in the reasoning process

decorators.description: Structures the AI's response as a sequence of clearly labeled steps. This decorator helps break down complex processes, explanations, or solutions into manageable, sequential parts for better understanding.

parameters.name: numbered
parameters.description: Whether to number the steps or use bullet points

decorators.description: Controls the format of the AI's response output. This decorator ensures consistent formatting across different use cases, making responses more predictable and easier to process programmatically when needed.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The desired output format for the response

decorators.description: Adjusts the writing style and tone of the AI's response. This decorator helps ensure that responses are appropriately styled for different audiences and contexts, from formal technical documentation to casual explanations.

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: The desired tone and style for the response

decorators.description: Specifies the version of the Prompt Decorators standard to use. This decorator must be the first in any sequence when used, ensuring proper interpretation of decorators according to the specified standard version.

parameters.name: standard
parameters.description: The semantic version of the Prompt Decorators standard to use
